com.goprimer.internal.manager

Interface ExperienceCallback


  • public interface ExperienceCallback
    Interface used to provide communication from the Activity, and the ExperienceManager's actions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleDeepLink(OpenURLAction deepLinkAction)
      Delegates firing the deep link action, because navigational decisions should not be ade in the experience manager
      void handleExperienceError(ExperienceError error)
      An error occurred with the experience, most likely due to a misconfiguration.
      void handleExperienceFinished()
      The experience has finished.
      void handleFields(Map<String,Object> allFieldsMap)
      Override to receive the fields from the 'Submit Fields' Action.
      void handlePurchaseRequested(PrimerPurchase purchaseInfo)
      Override this to implement purchase behavior.
      void requestPermissions(String[] permissionTypes)
      This will delegate the requesting of the permissions from the activity (whom implements this)
      void showDialog(String title, String message, String positiveButtonText, String negativeButtonText)
      Shows a dialog from the activity
      void startInstalledAppDetailsActivity()
      Will fire the app settings intent from the activity

    • Method Detail

      • handleExperienceError

        void handleExperienceError(ExperienceError error)
        An error occurred with the experience, most likely due to a misconfiguration. Will pass down the error type so the caller can determine what to do. Typically this will just close the enclosing Activity because we don't know what to do
        Parameters:
        error - - ExperienceError of what went wrong

      • handleExperienceFinished

        void handleExperienceFinished()
        The experience has finished. From either a 'Next' action on the end, a 'Close' action

      • handleDeepLink

        void handleDeepLink(OpenURLAction deepLinkAction)
        Delegates firing the deep link action, because navigational decisions should not be ade in the experience manager

      • showDialog

        void showDialog(String title,
                @NonNull
                String message,
                @Nullable
                String positiveButtonText,
                @Nullable
                String negativeButtonText)
        Shows a dialog from the activity
        Parameters:
        title -
        message -
        positiveButtonText -
        negativeButtonText -

      • requestPermissions

        void requestPermissions(String[] permissionTypes)
        This will delegate the requesting of the permissions from the activity (whom implements this)
        Parameters:
        permissionTypes -

      • startInstalledAppDetailsActivity

        void startInstalledAppDetailsActivity()
        Will fire the app settings intent from the activity

      • handlePurchaseRequested

        void handlePurchaseRequested(PrimerPurchase purchaseInfo)
        Override this to implement purchase behavior. Be sure to call one of the 3 purchase related completion methods when you are finished processing the purchase request. ClientExperienceCallbacks.purchaseComplete(), ClientExperienceCallbacks.purchaseCancelled(), or ClientExperienceCallbacks.purchaseFailed(String, int)
        Parameters:
        purchaseInfo - - The information about the purchase (product id, etc)

      • handleFields

        void handleFields(@NonNull
                  Map<String,Object> allFieldsMap)
        Override to receive the fields from the 'Submit Fields' Action. Be sure to call one of the 2 completion methods to continue with the flow. ClientExperienceCallbacks.fieldsHandled(boolean) , or ClientExperienceCallbacks.fieldsHandledAdvanceToScreen(String, boolean, boolean)'
        Parameters:
        allFieldsMap - - a Map of all of the input fields.
